channel.title: Whonix user base size
channel.description: Are there any numbers on the size of the (Qubes)-Whonix user base? Actually I'm mostly interested in the shares of Windows/non-qubes-linux/qubes or ova vs qcow2 file downloads. The ova files work on linux too so this will be hard to separate, but you have to start somewhere ...

item.title: Whonix user base size
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Nice, thanks. But I was hoping it would be a little higher. Although, that is “daily use”. There would be many occasional users, boosting the number significantly in terms of total population base.

Patrick:

monthly whonix.org Website visitors: ~ 300,000

People like the wiki?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix user base size
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Some information published here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Investors

Statistics as per 15 March 2019:

  • daily Whonix-Gateway ™ users: 3682
  • daily Whonix-Gateway ™ for VirtualBox downloads per day: 2761
  • monthly whonix.org Website visitors: ~ 300,000 (?)
  • last 30 days Whonix ™ forums page views: 1.1 M

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix user base size
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Well Qubes alone is pushing 25K:

Qubes OS

Statistics

The graph is updated daily. Raw data is available at https://tools.qubes-os.org/counter/stats.json. Format is not documented and may change any time should the developers feel the need to include ...

Most people have set up Whonix templates as part of installation, even though the number doing downloads over Tor is a very small subset. So that gives you a rough idea for that subset.

No idea re: plain Whonix. As far as I’m aware Whonix itself doesn’t keep any stats on users e.g. upload data in the background. So maybe distrowatch could give you a rough idea.

Read full topic
